verses.verse: It was for freedom <S%G1657><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> set <S%G1659><s%> us free; <S%G1659><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> keep standing <S%G4739><s%> firm <S%G4739><s%> and do not be subject <S%G1758><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to a yoke <S%G2218><s%> of slavery. <S%G1397><s%>

Behold <S%G2396><s%> I, Paul, <S%G3972><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to you that if <S%G1437><s%> you receive <S%G4059><s%> circumcision, <S%G4059><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> will be of no <S%G3762><s%> benefit <S%G5623><s%> to you.

And I testify <S%G3143><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> who receives <S%G4059><s%> circumcision, <S%G4059><s%> that he is under <S%G3781><s%> obligation <S%G3781><s%> to keep <S%G4160><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> Law. <S%G3551><s%>

You have been severed <S%G2673><s%> from Christ, <S%G5547><s%> you who <S%G3748><s%> are seeking to be justified <S%G1344><s%> by law; <S%G3551><s%> you have fallen <S%G1601><s%> from grace. <S%G5485><s%>
For we through the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> by faith, <S%G4102><s%> are waiting <S%G553><s%> for the hope <S%G1680><s%> of righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

For in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> means <S%G2480><s%> anything, <S%G5100><s%> but faith <S%G4102><s%> working <S%G1754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>
You were running <S%G5143><s%> well; <S%G2573><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> hindered <S%G1465><s%> you from obeying <S%G3982><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>?
This <S%G3588><s%> persuasion <S%G3988><s%> [did] not [come] from Him who calls <S%G2564><s%> you.
A little <S%G3398><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> leavens <S%G2220><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> lump <S%G5445><s%> [of dough.]

I have <S%G3982><s%> confidence <S%G3982><s%> in you in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that you will adopt <S%G5426><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G243><s%> view; <S%G5426><s%> but the one who is disturbing <S%G5015><s%> you shall bear <S%G941><s%> his judgment, <S%G2917><s%> whoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G1437><s%> he is.

But I, brethren, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I still <S%G2089><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> am I still <S%G2089><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%>? Then <S%G686><s%> the stumbling <S%G4625><s%> block <S%G4625><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> has been abolished. <S%G2673><s%>
Would <S%G3785><s%> that those <S%G3588><s%> who are troubling <S%G387><s%> you would even <S%G2532><s%> mutilate <S%G609><s%> themselves.

For you were called <S%G2564><s%> to freedom, <S%G1657><s%> brethren; <S%G80><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> [do] not [turn] your freedom <S%G1657><s%> into an opportunity <S%G874><s%> for the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but through <S%G1223><s%> love <S%G26><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

For the whole <S%G3956><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> in the [statement], "You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>"

But if <S%G1487><s%> you bite <S%G1143><s%> and devour <S%G2719><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> take <S%G991><s%> care <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> you be consumed <S%G355><s%> by one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
But I say, <S%G3004><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and you will not carry <S%G5055><s%> out the desire <S%G1939><s%> of the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

For the flesh <S%G4561><s%> sets <S%G1937><s%> its desire <S%G1937><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> for these <S%G3778><s%> are in opposition <S%G480><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that you may not do <S%G4160><s%> the things that you please. <S%G2309><s%>
But if <S%G1487><s%> you are led <S%G71><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> you are not under <S%G5259><s%> the Law. <S%G3551><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> are evident, <S%G5318><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> are: immorality, <S%G4202><s%> impurity, <S%G167><s%> sensuality, <S%G766><s%>

idolatry, <S%G1495><s%> sorcery, <S%G5331><s%> enmities, <S%G2189><s%> strife, <S%G2054><s%> jealousy, <S%G2205><s%> outbursts <S%G2372><s%> of anger, <S%G2372><s%> disputes, <S%G2052><s%> dissensions, <S%G1370><s%> factions, <S%G139><s%>

envying, <S%G5355><s%> drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> carousing, <S%G2970><s%> and things like <S%G3664><s%> these, <S%G3778><s%> of which <S%G3739><s%> I forewarn <S%G4302><s%> you just <S%G2531><s%> as I have forewarned <S%G4275><s%> you that those <S%G3588><s%> who practice <S%G4238><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things <S%G5108><s%> shall not inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is love, <S%G26><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> patience, <S%G3115><s%> kindness, <S%G5544><s%> goodness, <S%G19><s%> faithfulness, <S%G4102><s%>
gentleness, <S%G4240><s%> self-control; against <S%G2596><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things <S%G5108><s%> there is no <S%G3756><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who belong to Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> have crucified <S%G4717><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> with its passions <S%G3804><s%> and desires. <S%G1939><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> let us also <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%> by the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Let us not become <S%G1096><s%> boastful, <S%G2755><s%> challenging <S%G4292><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> envying <S%G5354><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
